ferment.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if fruit, beer, wine etc ferments, or if it is fermented, the sugar in it changes to alcohol
ferment.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a situation of great excitement or trouble in a country, especially caused by political change
ferment.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: the artistic ferment of the late sixth century
In the 1960s, American society was in ferment.
